tool.help:
**What it does**
Accepts fastqsanger sample files, extracts a unique portion of the file name as the sample name, and writes it to the output. The output text file can be consumed by the **Parse parameter value** expression tool to provide workflow parameter values to the **Read group identifier (ID)** and the **Sample name identifier (SM)** parameters in the **Map with BWA-MEM** tool.
